22#include "ptable.h"
23#include "errarg.h"
24#include "error.h"
25
26unsigned long hash_string(const char *s)
27{
28 assert(s != 0);
29 unsigned long h = 0, g;
30 while (*s != 0) {
31 h <<= 4;
32 h += *s++;
33 if ((g = h & 0xf0000000) != 0) {
34 h ^= g >> 24;
35 h ^= g;
36 }
37 }
38 return h;
39}
40
41static const unsigned table_sizes[] = {
42101, 503, 1009, 2003, 3001, 4001, 5003, 10007, 20011, 40009,
4380021, 160001, 500009, 1000003, 2000003, 4000037, 8000009,
4416000057, 32000011, 64000031, 128000003, 0
45};
46
47unsigned next_ptable_size(unsigned n)
48{
49 const unsigned *p;
50 for (p = table_sizes; *p <= n; p++)
51 if (*p == 0)
52 fatal("cannot expand table");
53 return *p;
54}
